channel.title: Help connecting
channel.description:
Hi, I have this client that I have worked on and I wanted to find a source for it so I dled the pur3scapez source or w/e it's called but when I try to connect to it with my client it just says error connecting. Is there a way I can make it work by like intergrating the client and source?
This is what it has on the CMD -
[code]011/05/28 18:20:37] [AnonymousIoService-1]: New session from: /127.0.0.1:58087 [2011/05/28 18:20:37] [AnonymousIoService-2]: Login request: [username=null,password=Â¯KÂ­=Â°â€°G]. [2011/05/28 18:20:38] [AnonymousIoService-3]: Session is now idle: /127.0.0.1:58087 [2011/05/28 18:20:38] [AnonymousIoService-4]: Session has been closed: /127.0.0.1:58087[/code]
